column1: '''Wintring''' in [[Bree]] was the tenth month of the [[Bree Calendar]]
column2: corresponding to [[Winterfilth]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately corresponding to modern [[22 September]] through [[21 October]]).<ref name=cal>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

column1: The [[Shire-hobbits]] believed that Wintring was a Bree alteration of the older name.<ref name=cal/>
